Actions.Name: Ancient Geo
Actions.Effects: Dazed foes take +[D] from either effect.

Actions.Name: Charged Stone Toss
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 takes 2 damage and is shoved 1, then create a height 1 boulder object next to them.

Actions.Name: Earthforce
Actions.Description: An adjacent object is shoved 3. Characters in its path are shoved 1 to either side, then take [fray] damage and become dazed.

Actions.Name: Hurl Self
Actions.Description: The Boulder hob reduces its max hp by 25%, hurling part of itself at a foe. A foe in range 5 must save or take 3[D]+[fray], be shoved 3, and become stunned. On a successful save, they are shoved 1, dazed, and take [D]+[fray]. Then, create a height 1 boulder object adjacent to that foe. The hob can reduce its hp to 0 and defeat itself with this move.
